name: CubeGuy (PrabuRaz)
description:
Cube Guy is a 2D platformer, Made with UNITY , Where you traverse through certain levels to complete the game.

Language used : c#

Cube Guy is one of my little hobby project developed along with some of friends.

Its quite  tough for beginners  but not so much when you get a hold of the mechanism.

Every level lets the CubeGuy flex on his different abilities and its up to you to put them to good use.  

MY CONTRIBUTION :

Took care of Mr. Cube Guy's  movements.

Designed the largest level in game(including water level).

Gave CubeGuy some spicy abilities like seeing the unknown and fulfilled his dream  of being THE AQUAMAN.

Worked on some elements of UI.

Contributed to the audio of the game.

CONCEPTS I'VE LEARNED :

Sprie mask.

Under Water Simulation(played with RigidBody). 

Particle Systems.

Level Design.

Projectile / Canon System.

Link to Git : CubeGuy-GitHub
